name: UnBlock The Red Ball Pro
description:
UnBlock The Red Ball

- UnBlock The Red Ball by moving blocks in this challenging, addictive & brand new Unblock game.
- 1000s of interesting puzzles in six different game modes each having hundreds of puzzles.
- Ultimate mind game to pass your boring moments and it also refreshes your thinking.
- Pocket the colored Angry Mouse Maze in the same color holes in given moves, avoid dropping them anywhere else.
- Angry Mouse Maze move realistically and are lively animated even while moving the blocks.

***HOW TO PLAY***

- Touch and drag the blocks to move them.
- Move the blocks such that you get the Angry Mouse Maze near their matching colored holes.
- Think and play with strategy to pocket the Angry Mouse Maze in minimal moves.
- Repeat failed levels by playing alternate moves to find new routes.
- Brand new & unique unblock game...
- Single Angry Mouse Maze, Multi UnBlock The Red Ball , Red & Blue Angry Mouse Maze, Magic Wall, Splitting UnBlock The Red Ball & Super Block game packs.
- Complete 50 Levels in Single UnBlock The Red Ball to unlock Multi UnBlock The Red Ball pack.
- Unlock successive packs by finishing 50 Levels in each pack.

***OTHER FEATURES***

- Top up extra moves with lives in tough levels.
- All levels are star rated with skill based scoring system.
- 30 Achievements and 9 Leader boards to compete.
- Apple Store leader boards and achievements for all game modes.
- Share this game with friends and compete with them for top scores.
- Get free lives by inviting friends and watching sponsored videos.
- Unique and new game for all in family.
- Ultimate mind game puzzles for passing time.

**BEST OF LUCK**
